text: Camberwell is a closed railway station in Camberwell, South London, England. It was opened in 1862 by the London, Chatham and Dover Railway. It closed to passengers in 1916 and closed to all traffic in 1964. In 2018, local campaigners raised a 2,000 signature petition to re-open the station.Camberwell Quarterly, The magazine of the Camberwell Society, No. 197 Summer 2018, page 4 ==References== Category:Railway stations in London
title: Camberwell railway station (England)
